Author: Kohei Horikoshi
Description: The conclusion of the story of a society where most of the population has a superpower called Quirks.

Title: THE ADVENTURES OF SUPER DIAPER BABY
Author: Dav Pilkey
Description: Super Diaper Baby and Diaper Dog try to make the world safe from Deputy Dangerous.

Title: THE SCARLET SHEDDER
Author: Dav Pilkey
Description: The 12th book in the Dog Man series. Dog Man finds himself back on his hind legs after being sprayed by a skunk.

Title: LORE OLYMPUS, VOL. 9
Author: Rachel Smythe
Description: Hades and Persephone must rescue a young god to attain freedom for Olympus.

Title: DANDADAN, VOL. 15
Author: Yukinobu Tatsu
Description: After an alien invasion is averted, Okarun and others become suspicious of the advisor assigned to their research club.

Title: WARRIORS: THE PROPHECIES BEGIN
Author: Erin Hunter
Description: A graphic novel adaptation of "Into the Wild" and "Fire and Ice."

Title: KAREN'S GHOST
Author: Ann M. Martin
Description: The ghost of Old Ben Brewer and his spooky friends are going to have a party in Karen and Kristy’s attic.

Title: WARRIORS: THE PROPHECIES BEGIN #2
Author: Erin Hunter
Description: A graphic novel adaptation of “Forest of Secrets" and “Rising Storm.”

Title: INVESTIGATORS: CASE FILES
Author: John Patrick Green and Steve Behling
Description: The spy alligator duo Mango and Brash work to solve six new mysteries.

Title: DEMON SLAYER: KIMETSU NO YAIBA, VOL. 1
Author: Koyoharu Gotouge
Description: A young charcoal seller must avenge his family by destroying the demon that slaughtered them.

Title: MRBALLEN PRESENTS: WHERE NIGHTMARES LIVE
Author: MrBallen with Robert Venditti
Description: Nine horror stories based on real events.

Title: AS GOOD AS DEAD
Author: William W. Johnstone and J.A. Johnstone
Description: Two western stories: “Strike of the Mountain Man” and “Butchery of the Mountain Man.”

Title: THE WAITING
Author: Michael Connelly
Description: The sixth book in the Ballard and Bosch series. Bosch’s daughter, Maddie, becomes a new volunteer on the cold case unit.

Title: MUST LOVE CHRISTMAS COWBOYS
Author: Diana Palmer and Heather Graham
Description: Two holiday stories: Diana Palmer's "The Perfect Gift" and Heather Graham's "Christmas, Crime, and a Cowboy."

Title: PAINTING THE TOWN RED
Author: William W. Johnstone and J.A. Johnstone
Description: The second book in the Dead Broke, Colorado series. Mayor Nugget’s zinc boulder attracts a lot of attention.

Title: TRIANGLE
Author: Danielle Steel
Description: A woman who runs an art gallery in Paris falls for a publisher who is married and reconnects with an old college boyfriend.

Title: A CHRISTMAS DUET
Author: Debbie Macomber
Description: A woman on a solo holiday retreat encounters complications with the son of a small town’s main store proprietor.

Title: DARK HOPE
Author: Christine Feehan
Description: The 38th book in the Carpathian series. Will Benedek and Silke defeat an adversary bent on destruction?

Title: WINTER WONDERLAND
Author: Nora Roberts
Description: Two holiday stories: “Gabriel's Angel” and “A Will and a Way.”

Title: THE HONORABLE TEXAN
Author: Diana Palmer
Description: Two western romance stories: “Blake” and “Rey.”

Title: VINCE FLYNN: CAPTURE OR KILL
Author: Don Bentley
Description: The 23rd book in the Mitch Rapp series. In 2011, operations take place to prevent a looming war in the Middle East.

Title: YOU DON’T WANT TO KNOW
Author: Lisa Jackson
Description: Living in a fog of grief over the disappearance of her toddler son two years earlier, a woman begins to have unsettling visions.

Title: HIS AMISH CHRISTMAS SURPRISE
Author: Virginia Wise
Description: After a disastrous Rumspringa, Leah finds a baby on her doorstep and she forms a tenuous relationship with a man unsure about his return to the Amish community.

Title: TRIAL BY FIRE
Author: Danielle Steel
Description: The chief executive of a Paris-based perfume business finds her future in jeopardy when she assists after brush fires occur in Napa Valley.

Title: TOGETHER FOR FOREVER
Author: Nora Roberts
Description: Two romance stories: “Megan's Mate” and “Irish Rebel.”

Title: THE AMISH NANNY'S SECRET
Author: Amy Lillard
Description: When Naomi nannies a widower’s five boys, members of the Amish community assume there is an engagement.

Title: THE MILLICENT QUIBB SCHOOL OF ETIQUETTE FOR YOUNG LADIES OF MAD SCIENCE
Author: Kate McKinnon

Title: IF HE HAD BEEN WITH ME
Author: Laura Nowlin

Title: IF ONLY I HAD TOLD HER
Author: Laura Nowlin
